thread.title: Every Dayton men's basketball game will be on TV in 2015-16
thread.title_full: Every Dayton men's basketball game will be on TV in 2015-16 - DailyHerald.com

author: Associated Press
title: Every Dayton men's basketball game will be on TV in 2015-16
text:
DAYTON, Ohio -- Every game of the University of Dayton men's basketball team 2015-16 season will be on television, for the first time.
The Dayton Daily News reports (http://bit.ly/1LyeYb6 ) the university recently released its upcoming schedule, complete with game times and broadcast network information.
The Flyers will play eight games each on both ESPN's family of networks and the CBS Sports Network. Time Warner Cable SportsChannel will air seven games and the NBC Sports Network will show three.
The American Sports Network will broadcast two games and Fox Sports Ohio has one.
Dayton's men's and women's teams both began practice last weekend.
The southwestern Ohio university's annual Red and Blue scrimmages are scheduled for Oct. 24 at UD Arena.
___
Information from: Dayton Daily News, http://www.daytondailynews.com
